title: container/list cannot be copied
body:
by **djadala**: 
What does 'go version' print?
go1.2 linux/amd64

http://play.golang.org/p/9q2nvjs5TC

Hi, 
container/list can't be copied, because 'List' contains embedded sentinel 'Element'.

Please, make a note in the documentation that List values should not be copied, as in
package Sync.


alternatively, making sentinel Element detached may allow copying, i think.

Regards
Djadala
